patthana9.17:4.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana9.17:5.1: Naaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.17:5.2: Naaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.17:5.3: Naaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana9.17:6.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.17:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana9.17:8.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana9.17:9.1: Naaraṇaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.17:9.2: Naaraṇaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.17:9.3: Naaraṇaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanasappaṭigho ca naaraṇo naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana9.17:10.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighañca naaraṇaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.17:11.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana9.17:13.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.17:14.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye kamme … pe … magge vippayutte atthiyā avigate ekaṃ.
